metadata.dc:author: Chiocca, J C
Berli, D E
Salis, G B
metadata.dc:description: Two cases of esophageal injury secondary to drugs are hereby presented, reviewing the different types of drugs, predisposing factors, physiopathology and complications.
metadata.dc:title: Lesión esofágica por drogas.
[Esophageal lesion caused by drugs].
